sense.def:
To evade something
pomeni izogniti se nečemu, v kar se nočemo zaplesti.

seg.quote: He had found a way of evading responsibility.

sense.def:
To evade someone or something
pomeni doseči, da se nas nekdo ali nekaj, kar se nam približuje, ne dotakne.

seg.quote: Tim tried to catch her arm but she evaded him.

sense.def:
Če nekaj, na primer uspeh ali ljubezen,
evades someone
, tega nekomu nikoli ne uspe doseči.

seg.quote: Military glory had evaded him throughout his long career.
